item.title: URY on FM: The Turn-on
item.description:
Play

Synopsis

URY has been given a trial license by Ofcom to broadcast on FM for a year, and to celebrate turning on the shiny new transmitter we’ve brought some big campus names down to James Beach!

First aired: 11am-1pm, Wednesday 1st September 2021

Clip

Tracklist

Track Artist Time

Physical Dua Lipa 11:19

item.title: Just Turn It Off Already! Christmas '20
item.description:
Play

Synopsis

It’s the end of term one here at york and Christmas is right around the corner, and our Ofcom regulated broadcast hours.

Join us as we gather around the proverbial yuletide log and enjoy an evening of fun and games as we, the fine people of URY, get together for one last blast of Crimbo merriment and questionable radio content.

So come along, get festive, and enjoy while The Man (read as ‘Ofcom’) tries to (read as ’tells us to’) shut us down (read as ’not broadcast outside our allowed period’)

First aired: 10pm-12am, Sunday 6th December 2020

Tracklist

item.title: Keoni's Christmas Cave
item.description:
Play

Episode synopsis

(6/6) In high-concept fashion, join Keoni as he tries to escape his cave.

First aired: 3pm-5pm, Sunday 6th December 2020

Tracklist

Track Artist Time

About Keoni’s Cave

Someone’s kidnapped Keoni, locked him in the cave of URY, and has forced him to play music and do stuff to appease his captor(s). How will Keoni escape this week?

Episode credits

Captee Keoni D'Souza
Captor Isaac Lowe
Producer Alex Potts
Guests Molly Ahern
Lewis Caplen
Jasper Hubbard
Callum Morrison
Matt Price
Jevish Sydamah

item.title: URY Welcome Week 2020: Virtual Fair
item.description:
Play

Synopsis

Live from our homes, URY is providing the sound to your YUSU Fairs.

Like what we do? Join us here: https://ury.org.uk/getinvolved/
